caption.center: BRIAN J. FILASKY, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.850 Appeal from the Circuit Court for Volusia County, R. Michael Hutcheson, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Brian J. Filasky, Huntington Station, N.Y., pro se.
No Appearance for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
PLEUS, LAWSON and EVANDER, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
